ref.mixed-citation: Blanco G, R Gerlagh, S Suh JB, de Coninck C, Diaz Morejon F, Mathur R, et al. Chapter 5: Drivers, Trends and Mitigation. In: Climate Change 2014: Mitigation of Climate Change.
